pages.text: Enchantments and your Color Magic have a lot in common. That's why you weren't surprised when your first attempt to combine $(item)Enchanted Books$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l) was an instant success.$()$(br2)Placing an $(item)Enchanted Book$() onto the $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$(), surrounding it with matching $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$(/l) and supplying a steady stream of experience increases your books level.
Just try not to interrupt said process, otherwise it will stop entirely.
